remarks: The value of the zero function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnf0.a $e |- ( ph -> (/) e. A ) $.
cantnf0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A CNF B ) ` ( B X. { (/) } ) ) = (/) ) $.
